dsDescriptionValue.value: These data include annual parish registration data for Louisiana from 1966-2014. Reported in these data are the proportion of registered voters identifying as Republican and the proportion of African Americans who are registered to vote. Other parish-level predictors in these data include oil production, gas production, proportion of the overall population that is African-American, in-migration rates to the parish, the level of urbanization, and median household income.

files.description: Data from the 2006-2016 Cooperative Congressional Election Survey. Data are subsetted to only include respondents from Louisiana. Variables include respondent partisanship, ZIP code, and approximate location in eastings & northings.
files.label: ccesLApanel.tab

dataFile.description: Data from the 2006-2016 Cooperative Congressional Election Survey. Data are subsetted to only include respondents from Louisiana. Variables include respondent partisanship, ZIP code, and approximate location in eastings & northings.

files.description: R code to estimate a kriging model of the 2006-2016 CCES panel. The model reports estimates of the nugget, partial sill, and range. It also conducts a likelihood-ratio test of whether the spatial terms improve the model's fit to the data.
files.label: krigePID.R

dataFile.description: R code to estimate a kriging model of the 2006-2016 CCES panel. The model reports estimates of the nugget, partial sill, and range. It also conducts a likelihood-ratio test of whether the spatial terms improve the model's fit to the data.

files.description: Complete dataset of Louisiana voter registration information by parish, 1966-2014. Detailed variable information is described in the codebook.
files.label: laRegistration.tab

dataFile.description: Complete dataset of Louisiana voter registration information by parish, 1966-2014. Detailed variable information is described in the codebook.

files.description: R script that estimates all reported models and produces all reported figures from the paper. This script defines a function to estimate a dynamic spatiotemporal model that can easily transfer to other applications.
files.label: laTimeSpace.R

dataFile.description: R script that estimates all reported models and produces all reported figures from the paper. This script defines a function to estimate a dynamic spatiotemporal model that can easily transfer to other applications.

files.description: R code for estimating a model that includes a spatial lag of black electoral strength.
files.label: laTimeSpaceSLX.R

dataFile.description: R code for estimating a model that includes a spatial lag of black electoral strength.

files.description: Description of the replication files, including a codebook of the data file.
files.label: readme.rtf

dataFile.description: Description of the replication files, including a codebook of the data file.

files.description: Function that defines the log-likelihood of a spatially autoregressive panel data model.
files.label: spatiotemporal.R

dataFile.description: Function that defines the log-likelihood of a spatially autoregressive panel data model.
